lines: !send {action_log} 🏴‍☠️ | ...What? **Nobody** voted at all? Welp, time for everybody to get shot!
!send {action_log} 🏴‍☠️ | Success! Everybody voted **no**! Nobody (except any non-voters) will be shot.
!send {action_log} 🏴‍☠️ | Danger! Everybody voted **yes** so everybody got shot!
!send {action_log} 🏴‍☠️ | Betrayal! Somebody voted **yes**, so all you **no** voters will get shot!
